languages.text: {n}Лицо Ардженты вспыхивает от праведного возмущения.{/n} "{name}, ты очистил{mf||а} это место от еретиков, только чтобы взрастить новую ересь?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо Ардженты вспыхивает от праведного возмущения.{/n} "{name}, ты очистил{mf||а} это место от еретиков, только чтобы взрастить новую ересь?"

languages.text: {n}Argenta's face is alight with righteous indignation.{/n} "{name}, did you purge this place of heretics only to nurture a new heresy in their place?"
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Ардженты вспыхивает от праведного возмущения.{/n} "{name}, ты очистил{mf||а} это место от еретиков, только чтобы взрастить новую ересь?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta's face is alight with righteous indignation.{/n} "{name}, did you purge this place of heretics only to nurture a new heresy in their stead?"
{n}Argenta's face is alight with righteous indignation.{/n} "{name}, did you purge this place of heretics only to nurture a new heresy in their stead?"
{n}Argenta's face is alight with righteous indignation.{/n} "{name}, did you purge this place of blasphemers only to nurture a new heresy in their place?"
{n}Argenta's face is alight with righteous indignation.{/n} "{name}, did you purge this place of blasphemers only to nurture a new heresy in their place?"
{n}Argenta's face is alight with righteous indignation.{/n} "{name}, did you purge this place of heretics only to nurture a new heresy in their place?"

{n}Argenta's face is alight with righteous indignation.{/n} "{name}, did you purge this place of heretics only to nurture a new heresy in their place?"

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Argenta se ilumina con justa indignación.{/n} «{name}, ¿purgó este lugar de los herejes solo para dar lugar a una nueva herejía en su lugar?».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face is alight with righteous indignation.{/n} "{name}, did you purge this place of heretics only to nurture a new heresy in their place?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Argenta se ilumina con justa indignación.{/n} «{name}, ¿purgó este lugar de los herejes solo para dar lugar a una nueva herejía en su lugar?».

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタの顔は義憤に燃えている。{/n}「{name}、この場所を異端者から浄化し、その代わりに新たな異端者を育てるのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face is alight with righteous indignation.{/n} "{name}, did you purge this place of heretics only to nurture a new heresy in their place?"

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタの顔は義憤に燃えている。{/n}「{name}、この場所を異端者から浄化し、その代わりに新たな異端者を育てるのか？」

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔的脸上满是正义的怒火。{/n}“{name}，你消灭了这个地方的异端分子，仅仅是为了再培养出一群新的异端分子吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face is alight with righteous indignation.{/n} "{name}, did you purge this place of heretics only to nurture a new heresy in their place?"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔的脸上满是正义的怒火。{/n}“{name}，你消灭了这个地方的异端分子，仅仅是为了再培养出一群新的异端分子吗？”

languages.text: {n}Argentas Gesicht ist von rechtschaffener Empörung erfüllt.{/n} "{name}, habt Ihr diesen Ort nur von Ketzern befreit, um den Nährboden für eine neue Häresie zu schaffen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face is alight with righteous indignation.{/n} "{name}, did you purge this place of heretics only to nurture a new heresy in their place?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argentas Gesicht ist von rechtschaffener Empörung erfüllt.{/n} "{name}, habt Ihr diesen Ort nur von Ketzern befreit, um den Nährboden für eine neue Häresie zu schaffen?"

languages.text: {n}Le visage d'Argenta s'illumine d'une indignation vertueuse.{/n} « {name}, vous n'avez tout de même pas purifié cet endroit de l'hérésie pour laisser une nouvelle abomination s'épanouir à sa place ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face is alight with righteous indignation.{/n} "{name}, did you purge this place of heretics only to nurture a new heresy in their place?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage d'Argenta s'illumine d'une indignation vertueuse.{/n} « {name}, vous n'avez tout de même pas purifié cet endroit de l'hérésie pour laisser une nouvelle abomination s'épanouir à sa place ? »

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın yüzü, erdemli bir öfkeyle aydınlanıyor.{/n} "{name}, burayı kâfirlerden arındırmanın tek nedeni yerine yeni bir kâfirlik getirmek miydi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face is alight with righteous indignation.{/n} "{name}, did you purge this place of heretics only to nurture a new heresy in their place?"
